Fully automated geodesy and Photogrammetry tools for image to 3D: Designed for processing stereo imagery captured from various satellites, aircrafts and drones with and without camera information. Photogrammetry process uses camera model and RPC imagery information. Dynamic and Automated Processing Workflow: The fully automated workflow of IGiS Photogrammetry covers all steps of stereo processing including mosaicing, GCP extraction, bundle block adjustment, tie point generation, alignment, masking, correlation, triangulation, creating 3D photogrammetry models, DEM generation, hole-fill and smoothing. Novice users can use the automated suite without any prior training using the user-friendly GUI while professionals can use individual modules. There is no data size limitation for processing and analysis.
